title: Advertising Elo Boosting - Legal?
body:
I received this message by a elo booster advertising
[4:00] pyroswarmy: #1 Elo Boost Company

╔═════════════════════╗
        LOL ELOBOOSTING
        #1 Elo boost World 
        Master & Challenger 
                 Boosters
      cheap & fast & reliable
*LINK REMOVED*
*LINK REMOVED*
╚═════════════════════╝

replies.body:
Technically illegal.

Also, be careful with names.
9/10 they used hacked accounts, so you may want to remove the guys name and then send a support ticket.
